name: Burger Run (Duncan Vodden)
description:
• Out Run The Rat Horde!
  • Skating into Zombie Rats will slow you down
  • Hitting a Fire Will kill you!
  • Eating food gives you extra speed and a hit protection from Rats and Fire. The Famous Energy Drink will give you wings
  • Collecting Coins, food and going the furthest distance will give more score
  • Hitting Rats will lower your score
